```py
>>> df = pd.DataFrame({'A': 'a a b'.split(),
...                    'B': [1, 2, 3],
...                    'C': [4, 6, 5]})
>>> g1 = df.groupby('A', group_keys=False)
>>> g2 = df.groupby('A', group_keys=True) 
```
